verses.roman:
guru upekṣā kaile, aiche phala haya
krame īśvara-paryanta aparādhe ṭhekaya

synonyms: guru upekṣā kaile—if one's spiritual master rejects him; aiche—such; phala—result; haya—there is; krame—gradually; īśvara-paryanta—up to the point of the Personality of Godhead; aparādhe ṭhekaya—commits offenses.
translation: If one's spiritual master rejects him, one becomes so fallen that he, like Rāmacandra Purī, commits offenses even to the Supreme Personality of Godhead.
